name: BUTCHER Demo
detailed_description:
The easiest mode is 'HARD'!

BUTCHER is a fast-paced 2D shooter and a blood-soaked love letter to the cult classics of the genre. As a cyborg programmed to eradicate the last remains of humanity, your sole purpose is to well... annihilate anything that moves.

So grab your weapon of choice (from chainsaw, through shotgun, to grenade launcher) and kill your way through underground hideouts, post-apocalyptic cities, jungles and more. And if you're feeling creative, there are plenty other ways of ending your enemies' misery - hooks, lava pits, saws... no death will ever be the same.

If kicking corpses into a lava pit and adorning walls with blood is your idea of a good time, BUTCHER is THE game for you.

Demo features:

  • 3 levels on the mothership - an introduction to the full version!
  • Ultra-violent uncompromising carnage in the spirit of Doom and Quake (chainsaw included)
  • Put your reflex and patience to the ultimate test before you try the main game - are you the quality disposable killer-drone we seek for?
  • Experience our wicked, heavy soundtrack in action

short_description: BUTCHER is a fast-paced 2D shooter and a blood-soaked love letter to the cult classics of the genre. If kicking corpses into a lava pit and adorning walls with blood is your idea of a good time, BUTCHER is THE game for you.
reviews:
“HARDCORE”
John Romero

“I’ve enjoyed many games in 2015, but few have put a smile on my face the way Butcher has.”
Kotaku

“I can think of lots of reasons why shotgunning your way through some 2D pixels might turn your day around, but whatever the cause I recommend Butcher.”
Rock, Paper, Shotgun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows XP SP2+
  • Процессор: Core 2 Duo
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: DX 9.0/OpenGL 3.2 compliant with SM 2.0+
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 200 MB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Процессор: Core 2 Duo
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: OpenGL 3.2 compliant with SM 2.0+
  • Место на диске: 200 MB

linux_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS+
  • Процессор: Core 2 Duo
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: OpenGL 3.2 compliant with SM 2.0+
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
